title: C-Reactive Protein to Lymphocyte Ratio (CLR) and Lactate Dehydrogenase to Albumin Ratio (LAR) as Prognostic Biomarkers in Acral Melanoma: Association With Tertiary Lymphoid Structures and Immune Cell Infiltration.
